title: Satechi launches aluminum Dual Vertical Laptop Stand for Mac, iPad, and iPhone
content:
Satechi is out today with a new accessory to keep your Mac, iPad, or iPhone organized and easily accessible on your desk. The new Dual Vertical Laptop Stand supports two devices securely with a sleek and simple design.

moreâ€¦

The post Satechi launches aluminum Dual Vertical Laptop Stand for Mac, iPad, and iPhone appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Satechi has launched its latest Apple accessory: the Dual Vertical Laptop Stand for Mac, iPad, and iPhone with an aluminum design.
